% About

  In this website are described the codes used to reproduce the analysis and results of the research conducted by a master student Kaique dos S. Alves under the supervision of Prof. Emerson Del Ponte, Universidade Federal de Vicosa, MG, Brazil.

  The main objective of the reseach was to estimate the time virying infection rate of simulated and actual plant disease epidemics using a data assimilation method called Particle filter.
